Dear Mr. Sechovrafci:
As of January 1 195&, the NASH Fact Sheets were
incorporated in the NAFB Journal. A subscription to
that magazine is available at $4*90 per year. If you
desire to subscribe at this new priee, please let me
know by return mail*
Besides the Fact Sheets, the Journal contains
many articles prepared by leaders in the field of edu¬
cation and concern utilisation of radio and television
for education as well as the specific field of educa¬
tional broadcasting. With the exceptlonoof June, July.
August and September, the Journal is a montly publication
Sincerely,
JBG:Jw
